name: Healthcare
description: Heal for 10% of HP, gain a ghost copy of this back into your hand. (And gain $1,000)

immediateEffect.script: int heal = (int)(Player.MaxHP * 0.10); Player.CurrentHP = Math.Min(Player.MaxHP, Player.CurrentHP + heal); Player.Money += 1000; var ghostCopy = Card.Clone(); ghostCopy.IsGhost = true; PlayerHand.Add(ghostCopy); Log(PlayerDisplayName + " uses Healthcare! Healed " + heal + " HP, gained $1,000 and a ghost copy!");
